techmeme.title: OpenAI said "there's a new GPT-4o model out in ChatGPT since last week", but gave few other details; some users claim new step-by-step or multi-step reasoning (Carl Franzen/VentureBeat)
After Thierry Breton's letter to X before the Trump interview, the EU says the "timing and the wording of the letter were neither co-ordinated or agreed" upon (Alice Hancock/Financial Times)
Twitch rolls out video stories, which can be up to 60 seconds long and set to expire after one, 12, 24, or 48 hours, to challenge Instagram and TikTok (Aisha Malik/TechCrunch)
Canalys: AI PCs made up 14%, or 8.8M, of all PCs shipped in Q2; nearly 60% of AI PCs were Apple computers, and Windows PC shipments priced over $800 grew 9% QoQ (Canalys)
Sources: after recent OpenAI shakeups, Chief Scientist Jakub Pachocki, post-training lead Barret Zoph, frontiers research lead Mark Chen, others gain prominence (Stephanie Palazzolo/The Information)
